description:
Konrad Linser was an Imperial commander who served under Admiral http://anidb.net/ch188 [August Samuel Wahlen] during the pacification.
During the Imperial Civil War in 797 UC, Linser was a lieutenant who served aboard a supply ship of the Littenheim Fleet, fighting for the http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League]. His allegiance soon changed after he was injured and became one of the few survivors of his ship`s crew, when Marquis http://anidb.net/ch303 [Wilhelm von Littenheim] opened fire on his own vessels because they were in the way. He later presented himself to Admiral http://anidb.net/ch187 [Siegfried Kircheis] and offered to appeal to Littenheim`s troops in http://anidb.net/ch82218 [Garmisch Fortress] to surrender. However, Littenheim was killed in an explosion by http://anidb.net/ch82213 [one of his men] before this could be done.
By 799 UC, Linser was serving the New Galactic Empire of Kaiser Reinhard and held the rank of commander. He led the ground troops into the bunkers on Earth during the Empire`s pacification of the http://anidb.net/ch6232 [Terraist Church].
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Konrad Linser
